events.message: The customer reported that their car was involved in a collision with another vehicle at a busy intersection yesterday afternoon.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating a vehicle collision and damages to the car.
A claims agent was assigned to the case to initiate communication and gather more detailed information about the accident.
The customer was notified that their claim concerning the automobile accident has been officially acknowledged and is under review.
The customer was asked to provide a police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and a copy of their insurance policy for processing.
All requested documents including the police report and pictures of the collision damage were submitted by the customer online.
An investigation into the circumstances of the car accident was started to determine liability and extent of damages.
The investigation concluded that the customer was not at fault and that the damage estimates were valid and justified.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the cost of vehicle repairs and related expenses based on the investigation findings.
The customer provided positive feedback, expressing satisfaction with the quick processing and fairness of the proposed settlement.
The claim was formally approved for payment based on the acceptance of the settlement and completed investigation.
Payment covering the repair costs was issued promptly to the customer's designated bank account as agreed.
The claim was officially closed after the successful issuance of payment and confirmation that the customerâ€™s vehicle repairs were scheduled.
All documents and records related to the auto accident claim have been archived securely for future reference as per company policy.
